title: BasePlate spawn gate
body:
Started the game after selecting Teemo,
I didnt have any dc at start of game nor did any problems occur whilst loading!
When i started however, The invisible wall that is meant to disable So champions 
can leave the base plate did not Disable for me i was stuck on the baseplate for
7 minutes, This made the entire team rage and me get reported bye everyone for
 afking Has anyone else had this problem before?

The Link is to a video I recorded on my phone of the small event!

replies.body: That seems like a game-breaking bug. You're not on PBE are you?

PBE no, it only happens on verry verry verry rare occasions in the past 7 months since this video was made it happened only once more and that was again couldn't get off the spawn plate.. i am unsure the circumstances revolving around it all i can say is in both instances of the bug occuring i had a dc as soon as the game loaded like within the first 2 seconds of the match!
